segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, and the woman doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she’s still polishing that plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined, and the floor is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone walks in and stops this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and the stool is about to tip—I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR
